coding_practice.title: Maximum Gap
coding_practice.description:
Given an integer array nums, return the maximum difference between two successive elements in its sorted form. If the array contains less than two elements, return 0.

You must write an algorithm that runs in linear time and uses linear extra space.

examples.explanation: The sorted form of the array is [1,3,6,9], either (3,6) or (6,9) has the maximum difference 3.
The array contains less than 2 elements, therefore return 0.

coding_practice.explanation:
1. 如果陣列長度小於 2，直接回傳 0。
2. 將陣列排序。
3. 遍歷排序後的陣列，計算相鄰元素差值，取最大值。
4. 返回最大差值即為答案。
5. 時間複雜度 O(n log n)（由排序主導）。
